alert.note: Alert for Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Cascade County below 5000ft; Fergus County below 4500ft; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains; Northern Blaine County; Snowy and Judith Mountains; Western and Central Chouteau County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 11 at 1:47AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Judith Basin, Fergus, southern Blaine, southeastern Hill, southeastern Chouteau and northeastern Cascade Counties through 230 AM MDT... At 146 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong winds and showers along a line extending from 10 miles south of Fort Belknap to near Belt. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lewistown, Stanford, Harlem, Belt, Geraldine, Denton, Hobson, Winifred, Moore, Grass Range, Highwood, Geyser, Roy, Hays, Fort Belknap and Fergus. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
